title: Materialism Deconstructed| Bernardo Kastrup, Nancy Cartwright, Peter Atkins
description:
Looking for a link we mentioned? It's here: https://linktr.ee/philosophyforourtimes

Has physical materialism been undermined in favour of fields and energy, mathematics and information? This week we’re asking whether the world is only material, only made of physical stuff.

Metaphysical idealist Bernardo Kastrup, chemist and Fellow of Lincoln College at Oxford University Peter Atkins and Philosopher of Science Nancy Cartwright debate beyond material. Founding director of the Centre for the Study of the Senses Barry C. Smith hosts.
